Protected Vladimir Lenin: disruption by banned user [[User:Jacob Peters|Jacob Peters]] [edit=autoconfirmed:move=autoconfirmed]
restored deleted edits to previous version by [[User:Ultramarine]]
Oh, please. Give it a rest
restored previous edits; anon user has been reported both under [[WP:3RR]] and [[WP:SOCK]]
RV. If you continue to violate the rules you will be reported.
/* Lenin and the Red Terror */ removed primary source
Rv. We're not interested in primary sources.
RV. You are not allowed to post primary sources. Wikipedia does not serve that purpose
/* Lenin and the Red Terror */ Interesting
restored deletions by yet another IP sock
There were not any deletions, actually.
restored deletions by yet another IP sock

Category -- Lenin had partial Jewish ancestry
restored sources; reported user as sock and 3RR violator
Reach consensus before making controversial changes
rvv; IP has been reported as an IP sock and in violation of the 3RR
restored deleted sources & text; IP address reported
/* Lenin and the Red Terror */ clean up
/* Lenin and the Red Terror */ Leggett estimated not 250,000 but 140,000.
JS: Reverted edits by [[Special:Contributions/207.151.38.178|207.151.38.178]] to last version by Ultramarine
Please familiarize yourself with the 3 revert rule. If you continue, you will be reported.
Do not delete source material. If you continue to revert, I will report violation of 3RR rule
Rummel derives his work from other sources. Leggett derives his work from emigres and Denikin propaganda. Leggett does not favour 250k exexcuted by Cheka
Sigh. The sources you cite derive from a single source or set of sources e.g Leggett and White memoirs. Please do not delete sourced material.
/* Lenin and the Red Terror */ re-added estimates and sources; removed POV "unverifiable" statement; if you want to remove multiple sources, you'll have a lot of explaining to justify your actions
/* Lenin and the Red Terror */ corrected citation formatting
/* Lenin and the Red Terror */ added 3rd source
/* Lenin and the Red Terror */ restored information and sources; left the remainder untouched; the Barnes source (at least) has not been impeached
Leggett's work is misrepresented as he never says 250,000 to 300,000 were killed by the Cheka. Look into the talk page as to why his source is not acceptable
restored edits and source; please explain why you are deleting sources from this article
You cannot delete sourced material or misrepresent the work of others.
removed redundant sentences; restored deleted reference which contradicts anon's POV; added ISBN
/* Lenin and the Red Terror */ Perhaps this...
/* Lenin and the Red Terror */ Please bear with me while I sort out the proper citation format
/* Lenin and the Red Terror */ added ref
/* Lenin and the Red Terror */ Restored material deleted by "Truthprofessor" without any discussion. You cannot delete sourced material
restored quote - at least one other source supports this figure
/* Lenin and the Red Terror */ deleted dubious statement. misrepresentation of appropriate source
restored link to Wikipedia article; Wikipedia isn't considered a primary source
/* See also */ Primary sources are not acceptable
